evidence.claim: Upside Health leverages AWS for scalable hosting and infrastructure needs.
The company utilizes FHIR and HL7 standards for health data interoperability.
Integration with EHR systems to support HIPAA compliant data exchange.
Kafka is used for real-time data streaming and processing in their platform.
dbt is part of their workflow for data transformation and analysis.

icp.icp_reason: Upside Health utilizes X12 and supports API automation for healthcare data exchange.
